A student is having a serious problem with sorting numbers. He was being told to sort the number using bubble sort algorithm.
You have to write a program to sort the element using bubble sort with recursion.


Input
A array of number


Output
Numbers arranged in increasing order


Example

Input:

12 34 98 45 29

Output:

First pass: 12 34 45 29 98

Second pass: 12 34 29 45 98

Third pass: 12 29 34 45 98
